title: Design discussion: Git integration for preview, diff, rollback, validation, and version control

Topics to discuss:
- Preview/diff of changes before applying (especially for LLM operations)
- Rollback/undo functionality for LLM modifications
- Validation and quality checks as pre-commit hooks
- Automatic versioning of .qmd files and rendered outputs
- Git workflow integration (branching strategies, etc.)
- Conflict resolution for concurrent edits

Output: Design decisions and potentially new epics based on discussion.
